message:
This is a friendly reminder to complete the required activities in the {{ doc.doctype }} Form. These activities are important for ensuring a smooth onboarding process.

New Joinee Details:

  • Applicant Name: {{ doc.applicant_name or doc.custom_applicant_name }}
  • Designation: {{ doc.designation }}
  • Department: {{ doc.department }}
    • {% if doc.work_location %}
  • Work Location: {{ doc.work_location }}
    • {% endif %}
  • Company: {{ doc.company }}

Please complete the activity by the deadline to keep the onboarding on track.

Best regards,
The {{ doc.company }} HR Team
name: Reporting Manger Checklist
subject: Reminder: Complete Your {{ doc.doctype }} Activity
